Based People

Never miss what tech leaders actually say

Stop chasing noise. Get the actual quotes from the people who shape technology. When Elon tweets, Sam speaks, or Zuck testifies—you'll know immediately.

Why You Need This

Signal over Noise

Skip the Twitter drama and Reddit speculation. Get verified quotes from actual public appearances—podcasts, conferences, congressional hearings.

Stay Ahead of Shifts

When tech leaders change their tune on AI safety, crypto regulation, or market direction—you hear it first, with full context.

Your Time is Valuable

Instead of following 50 people across 10 platforms, get curated updates from the voices that actually matter to your work.

Real Quotes, Real Context

Not clickbait headlines or out-of-context clips. Full statements with source links to verify everything yourself.
